name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Full Stack Engineer with 8 years of experience, I specialize in high-performance web applications utilizing **React**, **TypeScript**, **Node.js**, and **Express**. My technical expertise encompasses front-end development with modern libraries like **Redux** and hooks, alongside backend technologies such as **PostgreSQL** and **MongoDB**. Proficient in designing and implementing **REST** and **GraphQL** APIs, I ensure application performance and security requirements are met, leveraging **CI/CD** best practices for streamlined deployment. 

I possess strong problem-solving skills and a collaborative approach, consistently striving for excellence in code quality and user experience. My background includes building responsive solutions compliant with security standards, demonstrating a profound understanding of performance metrics using tools like **Lighthouse** and **Axe**. With hands-on experience in **Python** and working in cloud environments like **AWS**, I am adept at tackling complex challenges in software development while maintaining a focus on user-centered design and delivery.
